description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 1st level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.L5Sd8oX9gvefPquO]{Aura of Astral Radiance}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.05zkjuXS2CYdB1Pm]{Levy of Damnation}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.FIvKPAsGtR57ChZM]{Manifestation of Wrath}
